task1.trends: Noticeable increase in organic produce orders (especially apples) and free-range eggs over the past quarter, while conventional wheat orders show seasonal consistency. Grass-fed beef orders have modest but steady growth.

task2.factors: Forecast accounts for: 1) 15% projected growth in organic produce based on historical trends, 2) 3-5% seasonal increase in wheat demand, 3) expanding consumer preference for ethical meat products (+18% YOY), 4) continued shift from conventional to free-range egg purchases. Market reports indicate strong consumer focus on sustainability and animal welfare.
